title: Flash
createFlashAlertTitle: You are creating a new flash
alertDescription1: If you do not choose a planning, a new planning with an associated assignment will be created for you.
alertDescription2: This {{documentType}} will be added to a new assignment in the selected planning.

promptDescriptions.newPlanningWillBeCreated: A new planning with an associated assignment for this {{type}} will be created for you.
promptDescriptions.typeWillBeAddedToPlanning: This {{type}} will be added to a new assignment in the planning "{{planningName}}".
promptDescriptions.alsoTypeCreated: In the same planning, a text assignment with the {{type}} content will also be added.
promptDescriptions.alsoTypeCreatedWithApproved: A new, internal planning with an associated assignment for this article will be created for you. The article will have the status Approved. Remember to update and publish the planning!
